Posts.Content: Dec 28, 2014 05:21PM Lucyfish747 wrote: I know how you feel. I had my biopsy last Tuesday and they told me I would get the results tomorrow or Tuesday. I feel like I have this black cloud hanging over my head and it's ruining my day. I would definetly call first thing in the morning as well. Were in this together so if you need support feel free to write. It does help.
Posts.Title: results were supposed to be in today moore14 Ariom

Posts.Content: Dec 16, 2014 09:04AM Lucyfish747 wrote: I know how u feel, I had my mammogram and ultrasound Thursday and the doctor saw a mass 9 something and said he thinks it's cancer! I wish he hadn't said that as I am now terrified. My biopsy is Tuesday so I must wait the weekend myself. I am so scared and feel very alone. I just joined here and hope I can get some support from others going thru the same scary things.
